name: Pharblex Spattergoo

trait.name: Amphibious
text: Pharblex can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Poison Strike (3/Day)
text: Once per turn, when Pharblex hits with a melee attack, he can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 (2d8) poison damage.

trait.name: Standing Leap
text: As part of his movement and without a running start, Pharblex can long jump up to 20 feet and high jump up to 10 feet.

trait.name: Swamp Camouflage
text: Pharblex has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: Pharblex is a 6th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Pharblex has the following spells prepared from the druid spell list:
Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, guidance, poison spray
• 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, entangle, healing word, thunderwave
• 2nd level (3 slots): barkskin, beast sense, spike growth
• 3rd level (3 slots): plant growth, water walk

action.name: Multiattack
text: Pharblex attacks twice. Once with his bite and once with his spear.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Spear
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit. reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: druidcraft, guidance, poison spray, cure wounds, entangle, healing word, thunderwave, barkskin, beast sense, spike growth, plant growth, water walk
description: Source: Hoard of the Dragon Queen p. 91
